messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On November 23, DET. J. R. Adams was alerted about a break-in at Whitestone Elementary School. Key informants were Mrs. Lane, the school principal, and Mr. Walters, a custodian. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. K. S. Mitchell - OPERATIONS Det. Adams, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective T. U. Bell and Detective V. W. Carter were called in for assistance. PEARSON 06:20 Break-In Mrs. Lane reported missing laptops from the computer lab, and Mr. Walters described a broken window in the east wing. Glass. Technician Lily collected shards and footprints from the scene. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Adams Sr, Det. Bell, Det. Carter OPERATIONS Lt. Mitchell INFORMANT Walters, Peter 46 Cedar Street, Whitestone, Illinois 153-570. 92635. PEARSON 06:20 Break-In By 7:30 AM, Detectives Adams, Bell, and Carter, under Lieutenant Mitchell's guidance, reviewed the school's security footage. Captain X. Y. Davis recommended an audit of all stolen items. Sergeant Z. A. Brooks and Sergeant B. C. Dawson coordinated with nearby pawn shops. By 9:00 AM, potential suspects were identified. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Adams Sr, Det. Bell, Det. Carter OPERATIONS Lt. Mitchell AFFIDAVIT - Break-In Report 1) Security Tapes 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) List of Stolen Items 5) School Entry Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE G. Evans W.E.P.D. 16.10 P42 1873 Lane, KAREN NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 110-2175 DETECTIVE: J. ADAMS ITEM: 42-4750- 93 CRIME: 06:20 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 82210 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 5/15/23 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. J. R. Adams  Officer Context: On November 23, DET. J. R. Adams was alerted about a break-in at Whitestone Elementary School. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. K. S. Mitchell  Officer Context: Lt. K. S. Mitchell - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective T. U. Bell  Officer Context: Detective T. U. Bell and Detective V. W. Carter were called in for assistance. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective V. W. Carter  Officer Context: Detective T. U. Bell and Detective V. W. Carter were called in for assistance. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Lily  Officer Context: Glass. Technician Lily collected shards and footprints from the scene. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Adams  Officer Context: By 7:30 AM, Detectives Adams, Bell, and Carter, under Lieutenant Mitchell's guidance, reviewed the school's security footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Bell  Officer Context: By 7:30 AM, Detectives Adams, Bell, and Carter, under Lieutenant Mitchell's guidance, reviewed the school's security footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Carter  Officer Context: By 7:30 AM, Detectives Adams, Bell, and Carter, under Lieutenant Mitchell's guidance, reviewed the school's security footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain X. Y. Davis  Officer Context: Captain X. Y. Davis recommended an audit of all stolen items. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant Z. A. Brooks  Officer Context: Sergeant Z. A. Brooks and Sergeant B. C. Dawson coordinated with nearby pawn shops. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant B. C. Dawson Officer Context: Sergeant Z. A. Brooks and Sergeant B. C. Dawson coordinated with nearby pawn shops. Officer Role: Sergeant
